duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement aspects of event strategy
Manage financials including developing budgets, tracking against budget and forecast, and overseeing ongoing monthly financial reconciliation and final billing
Design and develop general session programming and staging
Oversee all aspects for on-site preparation and delivery including staff travels plans, creation of on-site requirements and support documentation, VIP management, risk management
Manage registration oversight, including budgeting, set-up of registration, financial management, on-site registration, and oversight of registration support team
Facilitate continuous communication between company units, clients, sponsors, attendees, and suppliers to meet the needs of client organizations

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree from an accredited four-year institution, Certification in Event Management or related professional certification is highly preferred
